entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [cdac] don't use EmbeddedResource in cdac-build-tool #107958
    10.0.0
  • Test.CoreLib is missing DefaultMemberNameAttribute #107953
  • [Fuzzing] AssemblyNameInfoFuzzer: CultureNotFoundException: Culture is not supported #107949
  • Add an `OrderedDictionary.TryAdd` overload that returns the `int`-based index of an entry if the key already exists #107947
    10.0.0
  • [swift interop] Cannot call instance methods with at least one parameter when using `SwiftSelf<T>` #107946
  • [API Proposal]: Add JsonSerializer.DeserializeAsyncEnumerable overloads accepting non-generic JsonTypeInfo and Type #107940
    Future
  • Local build of runtime failing when running CDac tool #107936
  • Investigate Tensor's Helpers.IsEqualWithTolerance helper #107934
    9.0.0
  • [9.0][osx] Access to path denied, bad file descriptor IOException in System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessTests.Start_RedirectStandardOutput_StartAgain_DoesntThrow #107933
    9.0.0
  • [9.0] Long running test timeout - Wasm.Build.Tests.AspNetCore.SignalRClientTests.SignalRPassMessageWasmBrowser #107931
    9.0.0
  • [9.0] System.Security.Cryptography.Tests native crash in RSAOpenSsl: !newKey.IsInvalid assert failure #107929
    9.0.0
  • [Source Generator] Source Generator works with dotnet cli but fails with `TypeLoadException` in VS #107926
  • System.Uri throws an exception for absolute URI without two slashes after protocol (http:hostname) #107922
  • Fuzzlyn: Assertion failed 'block->PrevIs(bPrev)' during 'Optimize control flow' #107920
    9.0.0
  • .NET event counters from System.Runtime are not reported in some circumstances in .NET 9 RC 1 #107919
  • [coreclr] `System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests` fails with `Index was outside the bounds of the array.` #107911
  • [mono][Perf] URI-related regressions on Mono: 12 Regressions on 9/10/2024 8:39:38 AM #107910
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 1 Regression on 9/10/2024 12:54:19 PM #107930
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 35 Regressions on 9/10/2024 6:39:57 AM #107925
  • [9.0][wasm] Timeout when downloading chrome-win.zip #107901
    9.0.0

Closed

  • System.Net.Security.Tests assertion failure: !newKey.IsInvalid #105715
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex #96496
    9.0.0
  • new X509Certificate2(byte[]) should return the signing cert for PKCS#7 on Unix #15073
    Future
  • BasicObjectsRoundTripAndMatch fails #107629
    9.0.0
  • ClientWebSocket ignoring custom SPN/UPN for Kerberos authentication #107733
    Future
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'tree->TypeIs(varDsc->TypeGet(), genActualType(varDsc)) ... #107045
    10.0.0
  • Provide a debug clr or enable debug message in the binaries? #107884
  • Add RequestFailed event to default HttpClientFactory logging #106284
    Future
  • Mono AOT Benchmarks crash with PlatformNotSupportedException in IndexOfAnyAsciiSearcher.IndexOfAnyCore #106914
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: Regressions in System.Text.Tests.Perf_StringBuilder #107042
  • Last versions of preview like 1-7 don't work with Microsoft ML Benchmarks. #106856
  • Announcement: BinaryFormatter is being removed in .NET 9 #98245
    9.0.0
  • Port System.IO docs for .NET 9 APIs #105979
    9.0.0
  • [mono][Perf] AOT-llvm BigInteger.Substract regression on 5/31/2024 7:00:20 PM #103460
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 5 Regressions on 10/19/2023 6:52:58 PM #94205
    9.0.0
  • How to sign data when using pkcs11 engine for openssl with a private key stored on an HSM #92798
    9.0.0
  • Fix regression or document breaking change in BinaryReader #93500
    9.0.0
  • `ConcurrentDictionary.TryRemove` sometimes does not remove an existing key #107525
    9.0.0
  • GetAlternateLookup<ReadOnlySpan<char>>() does not work on FrozenSet<string> in .NET 9 RC 1 #107840
    9.0.0
  • FileStream.Flush(flushToDisk: true) does not trigger FileSystemWatcher.Changed on macOS #31509
  • Stream.CloseAsync method #31561
  • Add "static" BinaryReader-like APIs on Stream #15747
  • Add FileSystem.Watcher support for NetBSD #16591
  • Move Windows ErrorMode setting from framework/runtime to the host #21779
  • MemoryMappedView.CreateView - better error message for insufficient virtual memory #22846
  • Linux: unable to cancel async read of /dev/input/input0 file #24052
  • API Proposal: Path API that exposes the Portable Filename Character Set #25010
  • NamedPipeClientStream.Connect(int) does not respect timeout on UNIX domain sockets #25751
  • Add UTF-8 match algorithm for FileSystemName? #25976
  • Add overloads for moving/copying files that flushes caches #28169
  • [System.IO.Pipes] Have a mechanism for lower privileged user to connect to a privileged user's pipe #28332
  • Slim variant of MemoryMappedFile #28720
  • JIT: Hint to "inline" generic type parameter #32815
  • Named pipes on MacOS can't connect in .NET 8 #101741

PullRequests

Created

  • Add DNMD into src/native #107961
    NO-MERGE, Hackathon, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • Clean up the notes on experimental APIs to simplify for maintenance #107959
    needs-area-label, 10.0.0
  • Implement Enumerable.Reverse(TSource[]) #107957
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Support class target in RUC/RDC code fixers #107956
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/9.0-rc2] Update configure.h.in #107955
    area-Host
  • Update configure.h.in #107954
    area-Host
  • [release/9.0] Remove invalid assert in RSAOpenSsl #107952
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Add missing docs for Task API #107951
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • [release/9.0-rc2] Mark the System.Formats.Nrbf assembly as [Experimental] with SYSLIB5005 #107950
    Servicing-approved, binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • Fix bad assembly when a nested exported type is marked via link.xml #107945
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Mitigate JsonObject and JsonValue performance regressions. #107944
    area-System.Text.Json, 10.0.0
  • NativeAOT Thread Name #107943
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-rc2] Replace VectorXx.Exp's edge case fallback with scalar processing #107942
    area-System.Numerics
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0-rc2' => 'release/9.0' #107928
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-codeflow
  • JIT: Visit blocks in RPO during LSRA #107927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Update lexical pointers after compacting blocks in `fgUpdateFlowGraph` #107924
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP][NO-MERGE][infra] Try osx.1200.amd64.iphone.open queue #107923
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-arm64, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios
  • [release/8.0] Fix compilation on ARM64 hosts #107921
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Unify two identical implementations of class_kind in SGen GC bridges #107909
    area-GC-mono, community-contribution
  • Linux/arm: More handling of resolution moves of float/double #107904
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/9.0-rc2] NRBF Fuzzer and bug fixes #107788
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Always use edge weights to assign block weight in `Compiler::fgSplitEdge` #107941
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove invalid assert in RSAOpenSsl #107932
    area-System.Security
  • Mark the System.Formats.Nrbf assembly as [Experimental] with SYSLIB5005 #107905
    binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • [release/9.0] Branding for GA #107879
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0-rc2] [release/9.0] BinaryFormatter tests improvements #107903
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] BinaryFormatter tests improvements #107540
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • Fix RegexOptions.Compiled|IgnoreCase perf when dynamic code isn't supported #107874
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • JIT: use explicit cast away GC when passing byref to unmanaged callees #107811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add missing documentation for new 9.0 APIs in System.IO #107376
    area-System.IO, 10.0.0
  • [mono] Remove .la fallback code in mono_dl_open_full #107907
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Introducing new event for failed http requests #106284 #106964
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Update internal macOS image in xplat-setup.yml #107871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0] Test only change - Ensure we create new RemoteInvokeOptions for every call #107875
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting

Updated

  • Allow un-examining in PipeReader.AdvanceTo(...) #107360
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Add draft of runtime async ECMA-335 changes #104063
    area-Meta
  • Add managed Mac signing implementation #107378
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Enable NuGet Audit and fix issues #107639
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • More doc updates for source-of-truth assemblies #107810
    documentation, area-Meta
  • [release/8.0] Fix a possible infinite wait for GC completion at process shutdown. #107844
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr
  • [workload] Fix the SDK band version and base the WBT on the sdk flow #107899
    needs-area-label
  • Compile the minipal as an object and static library #107889
    area-Infrastructure
  • Replace VectorXx.Exp's edge case fallback with scalar processing #107886
    area-System.Numerics, 9.0.0
  • WebSocket Feedback Follow-up #107662
    area-System.Net
  • Implement ProcessStartInfo.InheritHandles for Windows #107836
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Remove InternalsVisibleTo from System.Collections.Immutable. #107872
    area-System.Collections, 10.0.0
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • [WASI] sockets #106977
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Bump to updated llvm 19 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement Vector.AddSaturate/SubtractSaturate #107193
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks #107282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Put brotli on the FetchContent plan #107166
    area-System.IO.Compression, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 128.0.6613.119, windows: 128.0.6613.120 #107504
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [browser] Increase timeout and clean up after failed attempts of launching browser when testing #107865
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Fixing SetSlice, Reshape, TryCopyTo. #107852
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • [WASI] HTTP trailers #107795
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Remove JitGenericHandleCache #106843
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Cleanup some code under FEATURE_STUBS_AS_IL #104731
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-17
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge to Sep 24 #2688

Updated

  • Added documentation for binding most of the Swift types #2678
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add tracked SSA locals to the first basic block LiveIn set. #2684

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Why it won't work on macOS 15.0 #43509
  • Deduplicate NuGet sources provided from NuGet.Config and .NET CLI arguments for tool install #43507

Closed

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.4xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #42733
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/6.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43389
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/6.0.4xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43390
  • wasmconsole + WasmSingleFileBundle fails on Windows #43505
  • -bl is not working with dotnet run #43310
  • v9 SDK doesn't print nupkg path on `dotnet pack` #43248
  • Props/Targets files from nuget are not imported during Pack execution when multiple frameworks are targetted #43512
  • dotnet ef commands are not finding .NET in nixOS #43467

PullRequests

Created

  • Update to the November release downlevel versions #43523
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update implicit versions for October #43522
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc2] Correctly handle different architectures of the SDK #43521
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Pass official build id props via /p: #43520
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc2] Fix NullReferenceException for `dotnet tool update -g --all` #43516
    Servicing-consider, Area-Tools
  • Add Aspire service tests #43515
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2540600 #43514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • use prerelease version iteration 1 #43513
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Fix legacy package definitions design time builds #43496
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: sync behavior with other clients. #43491
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Merged

  • [main] Fix the formatting of the onelocbuildconditional #43519
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix the formatting of the onelocbuildconditional #43482
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • ExcludeFromSourceBuild->ExcludeFromSourceOnlyBuild #43477
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Only conditionally do copy steps, as non-existent source throws error #43504
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable stage-2 builds #43439
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Patch for Source-Build Stage 2 FSharp FS0064 Warnings #43436
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [release/9.0.1xx] Expand EOL list to include net7 6 months after it goes OOS per design #43441
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Expand EOL list to include net7 6 months after it goes OOS per design #43440
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Fix NullReferenceException for `dotnet tool update -g --all` #43157
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Clean up some code #42775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the error for targeting net9 in 17.11 #43143
    Servicing-consider, untriaged
  • Correctly handle different architectures of the SDK #43471
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Publish prebuilt reports for each repo #43336
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-SourceBuild
  • Merge the net10 dotnet/runtime and dotnet/aspnetcore codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Unstable branding with rtm label and empty iteration #43483
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add PGO for F# compiler #42514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: also try Basic auth when username is '<token>'. #43354
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-17
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Add `private` and `namespace` accessibility modifiers for top-level types. #6794
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Remove restriction that interpolations within a non-verbatim interpolated string cannot contain new-lines. #4935
    11.0
  • allow references to structs to be stored in fields of ref structs #1147
    11.0
  • Champion "Allow Generic Attributes" #124
    11.0
  • Support for method parameter names in nameof() #373
    11.0
  • Proposal: list pattern #3435
    11.0
  • [Proposal]: Auto-default structs #5737
    11.0
  • Switching ReadOnlySpan<char> with constant strings #1881
    11.0
  • Champion: numeric IntPtr #6065
    11.0
  • [Proposal]: Static abstract members in interfaces #4436
    11.0
  • [Proposal]: Support default parameter values in lambdas (VS 17.5, .NET 8) #6051
    12.0
  • Primary Constructors (VS 17.6, .NET 8) #2691
    12.0
  • Champion: using aliases for any types (VS 17.6, .NET 8) #4284
    12.0
  • [Proposal]: Allow nameof to always access instance members from static context (VS 17.7, .NET 8) #4037
    12.0
  • [Proposal]: Inline arrays (VS 17.7, .NET 8) #7431
    12.0
  • [Proposal]: Collection expressions (VS 17.7, .NET 8) #5354
    12.0
  • [Proposal]: ref readonly method parameters (VS 17.8, .NET 8) #6010
    12.0
  • [Proposal]: Partial properties (VS 17.11, .NET 9) #6420
    13.0
  • [Proposal]: Overload Resolution Priority (VS 17.12, .NET 9) #7706
    13.0
  • [Proposal]: Let ref structs implement interfaces and substitute into type parameters (VS 17.11, .NET 9) #7608
    13.0
  • Consider relaxing restrictions of async methods in blocks that do not contain `await`. (VS 17.11, .NET 9) #1331
    13.0
  • [Proposal]: Params Collections (VS 17.10, .NET 9) #7700
    13.0
  • [Proposal]: Lock statement pattern (VS 17.10, .NET 9) #7104
    13.0
  • [Proposal]: Method group natural type improvements (VS 17.9, .NET 9) #7429
    13.0
  • [Proposal]: String/Character escape sequence `\e` as a short-hand for `\u001b` (`<ESCAPE>`) (VS 17.9, .NET 9) #7400
    13.0
  • [Proposal]: Re-rename to Roles and Extensions #8431

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Port source generator balanced mode to VSCode #75152
  • VisualBasicCompilation.GetTypeInfo returns `null` for `ObjectCreationExpressionSyntax.Type` #75147
  • [IDE0004] False positive for null literal in interpolated string #75145
    Backlog
  • duplicate language feature status #75144
  • It looks like collection expressions make unnecessary copies of structures which could be big. #75143

Closed

  • Assert fires in `EnsureMetadataVirtual` #73563
    17.12
  • Assert failure in `BindMethodBody.assertBindIdentifierTargets()` with `[param:]` attribute on local function #73905
    17.12
  • XmlSeeAlsoElement uses 'cref' instead of 'href' #54201
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35316.82 #75142

PullRequests

Created

  • Updating to match Gladstone and Editor side changes #75153
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Properly iterate through an inline array used as a spread element. #75151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Ignore irrelevant exceptions when reporting LSP server NFW #75150
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Yield before performing Go To Definition work #75149
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add LSP handler to test Gladstone integration #75146
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Adjust IsMetadataVirtual assertion in MethodToClassRewriter #75066
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Exclude identifiers in misplaced attributes from identifier map #75100
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix SyntaxFactory.XmlSeeAlsoElement href overloads #75052
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • ExcludeFromSourceBuild->ExcludeFromSourceOnlyBuild #75136
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Merge latest bits from 'main' branch into extensions branch #75090
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode

Updated

  • Suppress an assert when an indexer is declared, but DefaultMemberNameAttribute is missing. #75099
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Field-backed properties: definite assignment #75116
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Upgrade xUnit #75068
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Consider `params` and default values when inferring unique method signature #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Fix null coalescing operator emit with span conversion #75103
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Fix symbol info in identifier name in object initializer #74582
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add `Enumerable.Reverse(this T[])` polyfill #75104
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • SynthesizedHotReloadExceptionSymbol #74625
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, 17.12
  • Use MSBuild globs to determine which file changes are relevant #75139
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Critical log on quic connection timeout #57933
  • Virtualize component Placeholder has no effect #57929
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct, ApiCrudGetProductDetails #57928
  • Perf regression: https #57927
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #57926
  • AntiforgeryValidationException preventing Blazor app to start on IIS Web App. (case sensitive url) #57920
  • Socket Connection closed Prematurely #57919
  • Blazor SSR Stream Rendering no longer works on iOS 18 or iPadOs 18 #57918
    9.0.0
  • AddAuthentication with AddOpenIdConnect, and webapp behind a proxy produce different callback URIs depending on client side rendering or server side rendering #57916
  • Disabling IPV6 in .NET Core #57914

Closed

  • Blazor not rendering state changes within a foreach list #57878
  • Quarantine AcceptNewStreamsDuringClosingConnection #41172
    Test failures
  • Blazor .NET 8 or 9 - Error HttpConnection.ProcessRequestsAsync QuicTransportOptions #57869
  • ProducesResponseTypeMetadata(200) added automatically to endpoint metadata in minimal apis #57801
  • HostBuilder Build PhysicalFileProvider on hostingEnvironment.ContentRootPath #57867
  • Visual Studio Browser Link trashes response compression #57905
  • Blazor: handling min max in html number input #57911
  • .NET 9 RC 1 blazor webassembly standalone issue in release mode #57908
  • AuthorizationMessageHandler 添加token到请求头异常 #57868
  • Blazor Minify Isolated CSS - Built in Feature #57883
  • Blazor Minify JSON #57884
  • Dependencies of bootstrap and jquery-validation in templates are out of date. #57119
    9.0-rc2
  • ShutdownTestWaitForShutdown test failure #27371
    Test failures

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix IAsyncEnumerable controller methods to allow setting headers #57924
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc
  • [TEST] Upload windows event logs #57923
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *
  • Allow same version when updating versions in node packages #57921
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Unquarantine AcceptNewStreamsDuringClosingConnection #57848
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Add output and retries to AddressRegistrationTests #57903
    needs-area-label, 10.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #57893
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Unquarantine ShutdownTestWaitForShutdown #57901
    area-hosting, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Allow ShowColumnOptionsAsync method to accept null parameter #56991
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add public method to QuickGrid to close column options UI #57904
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
  • Add a note about when to validate ping payloads #57795
    area-networking
  • Use System.Threading.Lock in Kestrel #57236
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • throw an exception on id.get if session is not available #57902
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Fix `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Diagnostics.EntityFrameworkCore` package README #57840
    area-middleware
  • [Templates] Fix template scripts, make them more flexible and robust #57841
    area-mvc
  • Feature/httpendpoint #57565
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Fix code generation for parsing optional array parameters in RequestDelegateGenerator #57336
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-networking
  • #14423 User can verify multiple times with the same two factor token #57728
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Quarantine CanUseAntiforgeryAfterInitialRender #57767
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • [IGNORE] Try to flush out #27157 #57897
    * NO MERGE *, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-17
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Error: No CLR runtime found (dump collected with 8.0.0) #4563
    9.0.0

Updated

  • TestLogsAllCategoriesDefaultLevelFallback fails frequently #2541
    Future
  • Please document CorGCReferenceType::CorHandleWeakWinRT #4171
    10.0.0
  • Fix Microsoft.Diagnostics.NETCore.Client.PerMapTests.GenerateAllTest and GeneratePerfMapTest for 8.0 #4191
    Future
  • dotnet-counters unexpected gc.heap.generation output #4935
    10.0.0
  • libsosplugin cannot be loaded into lldb (macos arm64) #4259
    9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Memory growth on Linux with "journal_mode=memory" #34695

  • "BUG" ? - Breaking change in EF Core 9 #34693

Closed

  • Remove DISTINCT inside MIN/MAX operations #34483
    10.0.0
  • LINQ creation fails when using join and user defined function #34266
  • Make SqlNullabilityProcessor into a real ExpressionVisitor #34696
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Optimize DISTINCT over collections of 0 or 1 element #34702

Merged

  • Optimize MIN/MAX over DISTINCT #34699
  • Make SqlNullabilityProcessor into a real ExpressionVisitor #34697
  • Change analyzer references to use the standard/recommended form #34596
  • Move runtime override to tests #34535
    blocked
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34691

Updated

  • Allow using foreign keys in Dataverse reverse engineering #34689
  • Add all precompiled query tests to the same collection. #34692

entry.content:

Closed

  • .NET Debian packages priority update #15919
